alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 7:08PM CDT until July 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BLACK HAWK COUNTY... At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jesup, or 11 miles west of Independence, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Black Hawk County, including the following locations... Gilbertville and Raymond. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
